emuInput.TitMainTitle: Portrait of W. Beverly Carter wearing moustache and dark necktie with small design, standing at microphone in Webster Hall for Republican State Committee meeting, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1958, pg. 1 reads: "Republicans Urge Equal Rights for All Citizens in Campaign Platform for '58 - W. Beverly Carter Jr....reads 4,000-word platform. Portion of accompanying article reads: "The Republican State Committee met at Hotel Webster Hall last Saturday morning and adopted a campaign platform pledging equal rights for all Pennsylvania citizens in fields of education, employment, organized labor and housing..."
